Docs.title: How Agri-OS Works
Docs.subtitle: A comprehensive guide to managing your farm, crops, and market connect using the Universal Farm Operating System.
Docs.step_profile_desc: Set your role (Farmer, Officer) and Pin your farming location.
Docs.step_map_desc: Go to 'My Farms' and define your land boundaries and zones.
Docs.step_cycles_desc: Log activities in 'Crops' to maintain a healthy yield history.
Docs.step_connect_desc: List harvest on 'Marketplace' or check prices via Voice AI.
Docs.feat_dashboard_desc: Your central command center. View real-time weather forecasts, market prices, and AI-driven alerts.
Docs.feat_auth_desc: Role-based security (Farmer, Broker, Officer) ensuring your data is private and access is controlled.
Docs.feat_location_desc: Precise GPS and manual location mapping to deliver hyper-local weather and soil insights.
Docs.feat_analytics_desc: Advanced tracking of your farming habits and interactions to optimize the platform for your needs.
Docs.feat_farm_mgmt_desc: Digitize your land. Map your farm boundaries using satellite imagery, divide them into active zones (Plots), and track specific crop cycles.
Docs.feat_farm_mgmt_tags: Satellite Map View,Zone/Plot Management,Soil Health Records
Docs.feat_crops_desc: End-to-end lifecycle tracking. Register crops from sowing to harvest. Log irrigation, fertilization, and pest control activities.
Docs.feat_marketplace_desc: Direct B2B/B2C trading. Sell your produce directly to buyers or purchase high-quality seeds and fertilizers.
Docs.feat_voice_desc: Multilingual AI support. Speak in your local language to ask about weather, prices, or advice.
Docs.feat_supply_desc: Blockchain-ready transparency. Generate QR codes for your harvest so buyers can trace the origin and quality.
Docs.feat_livestock_desc: Manage your animal husbandry. Track health records, breeding cycles, and vaccination schedules.
Docs.feat_drone_desc: Advanced monitoring. Integrate drone imagery to detect pest infestations or water stress in large fields automatically.
